constructor.details: This constructor is used to set the addresses of the storage and pair infos contracts

params._pairInfos: The address of the pair infos contract
params._pairsStorage: The address of the pair storage contract
params._storage: The address of the trading storage contract
params._trading: The address of the trading contract

returns.firstEmptyTradeIndexes: An array of first empty trade indexes

getLongShortRatios().details: This function is used to get long, and short ratios for all pairs

getMargins().details: This function is used to get margins for all pairs

returns.rolloverFeePerBlockLong: An array of rollover fee per block for long
returns.rolloverFeePerBlockP: An array of rollover fee per block
returns.rolloverFeePerBlockShort: An array of rollover fee per block for short in 1e10 precision

getOpenLimitOrdersCounts(address).details: This function is used to get all order counts for a given user address

returns.openLimitOrdersCounts: An array of open limit orders counts

getPositions(address).details: This function is used to get the aggregated trades and orders for a given user address *

returns._0: AggregatedTrade An array of aggregated trades
returns._1: AggregatedOrder An array of aggregated orders

params.requireSuccess: If true, require all calls to succeed

returns.blockHash: The hash of the block where the calls were executed
returns.blockNumber: The block number where the calls were executed

updateContracts(address,address,address,.details: This function is used to change the addresses of the storage and pair infos contracts. Only gov can call it.

params._pairInfos: The address of the pair infos contract
params._pairsStorage: The address of the pair storage contract
params._storage: The address of the trading storage contract
params._trading: The address of the trading contract

getEthBalance(address).notice: Returns the (ETH) balance of a given address

getFirstEmptyTradeIndexes(address).notice: Get empty trade indexes for a given user address

getLastBlockHash().notice: Returns the block hash of the last block

getLongShortRatios().notice: Gets long, and short ratios for all pairs

@title Avantis Multicall
 @notice Built on top of MultiCall3. Helpers deep aggregate results from multiple function calls.
